newsitem.headline: Notice: Changes to Newsfeed
newsitem.text: GSD Mobile, a new application of mine launched yesterday. This chrome powered application is a mobile signature of my website GocalSD. In this application, I will be using it's newsfeed to announce new products, promotions and information regarding development and new projects like Sapphyx Launcher. The Sapphire Launcher newsfeed will only retain information related to the project and not anything regarding promotions or un-related. Their howevor will be hints to check out the Google Plus Group for any promotion based event but nothing will be announced in this section. Thank you for time!

newsitem.headline: Update 11.4 Schedule *Updated*
newsitem.text: A recent failure do to the Windows10 Anniversary update has caused problems with my Ubuntu workstation dualboot and has delayed this update further more. The Windows update formatted and removed the Ubuntu partition in my desktop thus delaying development. Luckily backups were made and no data was lost. 11.4 update will roll out silently when its ready, thank you for understanding and apologies for any inconvenience. 11.4 will also open string translation to community members on github. More information as that becomes available.

newsitem.headline: Onyx & Premium License Update
newsitem.text: A scheduled update is due in October for Onyx and Prem license for licensing validation. This action is being taken to verify users for future license cary-over. The license you own will be carried over to other applications to prevent double purchases.

newsitem.headline: Onyx License Owners
newsitem.text: An early access awaits you in the future.

newsitem.headline: SUI Google Plus
newsitem.text: Join the Google Plus Group to get in on exclusive sneak peaks, dev previews, and one on one dev support!

newsitem.headline: Welcome and Thankyou for your support!
newsitem.text: Enjoy your stay, Ask questions, get involved with the communities and stay active! Sapphire UI is the community custom launcher powered by google exclusively for Android 5.0+
